timeline.bodyText: I think an import is a safe bet in this context.
timeline.author: szarnekow
szarnekow

replies.bodyText: Yes, the explicit import will win over java.lang.Module
replies.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: No need for iterables.first since we access the statement immediately afterwards. Make it module.getStatements().get(0)
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText: JavaDoc is outdated. There is no polymorphic dispatch.
timeline.author: szarnekow
